entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is described as the most horrible animal Harry has ever met, but Hagrid thinks it's a fluffy little bunny rabbit.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is singing a lullaby to the dragon and told Harry off for frightening it.

entities.name: hedwig

entities.name: ron

relationships.description: Hagrid is caring for the dragon and singing it a lullaby.
Ron owns the Norwegian Ridgeback, which Charlie wants to send over with some friends.
Charlie has friends who are coming to visit and will bring the Norwegian Ridgeback.
Ron is asked by Charlie to take care of the Norwegian Ridgeback at midnight on Saturday.
